name: DRAG'N AGE (gamejam)
description:
DRAG'N AGE was made in 72 hours for the OFFICE-BOT STRANGELOG JAM

Fly through space and time, kiss girls, swap time, and become reborn in this endless flyer !

A game made by:

TEAM BB with 2CHANGZZ and NICKY BOW-WOW ft. LIL KEV

Brady 'B' Legat - Programming

Brandon 'B' Martin - Technical Artist

Nick '2CHANGZZ' Chang - Character Artist/Animator

Nick 'NICKY BOW-WOW' Salle - Concept Artist, Background Artist

Liam 'LIL KEV' Savage - Character Artist/Animator
